/circle6 Dry your hands with a single-use sterile napkin or autoclaved newspaper pieces, or air 
dry them.
/circle6 Discard the napkin in the bin kept for the purpose. If you have used newspaper pieces, 
throw them in the black bucket.
Figure 18: Hand washing
Ensuring the Quality of Care
MODULE III
97
Once you have washed your hands, do not touch anything, e.g. hair, pen or any fomite, till you 
carry out the required job.
Remember: 
Rinsing the hands with alcohol is NOT A S
